official_title: Joint resolution to provide for the designation of the week of February 9 to 15, 1975, as National Vocational Educational Education Week.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to designate the week of February 9 to 15, 1975, as "National Vocational Education Week".

titles.title: Joint resolution to provide for the designation of the week of February 9 to 15, 1975, as National Vocational Educational Education Week.
